## Active Technologies
- (001-le-monsters-browser)
- TypeScript 5.3 (ES2020 target) + Phaser 3.70.0 (game engine), Vite 5.0 (build tool), Vitest 1.0 (unit testing), Playwright 1.56 (E2E testing) (002-game-visual-and)
- Static JSON files for level data (`public/assets/level-data/`), no backend database (002-game-visual-and)
